00078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::DoDataExchange
00083     (
00084     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00085     )
00086 {
00087     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00088     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_TXT_CURRENT_ID, mCurrentDriverId );
00089     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_TXT_CURRENT_STATUS, mCurrentDriverStatus );
00090     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_EDIT_NEW_ID, mNewDriverId );
00091     DDX_CBIndex( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_CBO_IDX, mIndex );
00092     DDX_Control( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_LST_STATUS, mDriverStatusList );
00093     DDX_LBIndex( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_LST_STATUS, mSelectedListIndex );
00094     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_EDIT_STATUS_ID, mNewDriverStatusId );
00095     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRVRINFO_EDIT_STATUS_TEXT, mNewDriverStatusText );
00096 }

00098 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 BOOL CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnInitDialog()
00106 {
00107     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00108 
00109     updateListBox();
00110 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00111     if( mCom.mUseMultipleDrivers )
00112     {
00113         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_LBL_IDX )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00114         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_CBO_IDX )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00115 
00116         for( uint8 i = 0; i < FMI_DRIVER_COUNT; i++ )
00117         {
00118             mCom.sendA607DriverIdRequest( i );
00119             mCom.sendA607DriverStatusRequest( i );
00120         }
00121     }
00122     else
00123 #endif
00124     {
00125         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_LBL_IDX )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00126         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_CBO_IDX )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00127         mCom.sendDriverIdRequest();
00128         mCom.sendDriverStatusRequest();
00129     }
00130 
00131     SetWindowPos( NULL, 250, 600, 0, 0, SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOZORDER );
00132     return TRUE;
00133 }    /* OnInitDialog() */
00134 
00135 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00139 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::updateListBox()
00140 {
00141     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator it = mCom.mDriverStatuses.begin();
00142     CString listItem;
00143 
00144     //must keep track of where the list was scrolled to
00145     //since we reset content we must reinitialize these
00146     int selectedIndex = mDriverStatusList.GetCurSel();
00147     int topIndex = mDriverStatusList.GetTopIndex();
00148 
00149     mDriverStatusList.ResetContent();
00150     //loop through ids and add to status list
00151     for(; it != mCom.mDriverStatuses.end(); it++ )
00152     {
00153         if( it->second.isValid() )
00154         {
00155             listItem.Format( _T("%d - %s"), it->first, it->second.getCurrentName() );
00156             mDriverStatusList.AddString( listItem );
00157         }
00158     }
00159 
00160     //reset scroll and selection
00161     mDriverStatusList.SetCurSel( selectedIndex );
00162     mDriverStatusList.SetTopIndex( topIndex );
00163 }    /* updateListBox() */
00164 
00165 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 afx_msg LPARAM CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnDriverStatusListChanged( WPARAM, LPARAM )
00171 {
00172     updateListBox();
00173 
00174     return 0;
00175 }

00177 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 afx_msg LPARAM CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnDriverIdChanged
00184     (
00185     WPARAM aIndex,
00186     LPARAM
00187     )
00188 {
00189     if( aIndex == mIndex )
00190     {
00191         //This displays the driver ID, but does
00192         //not request it.
00193         //When the dialog is initialized, it requests both.
00194         //The client should send messages to mCom if they are updated.
00195         TCHAR        driverId[50];
00196         MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mCom.mDriverId[ aIndex ], -1, driverId, 50 );
00197         driverId[49] = '\0';
00198         mCurrentDriverId.Format( _T("%s"), driverId );
00199         UpdateData( FALSE );
00200     }
00201 
00202     return 0;
00203 }
00204 
00205 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00210 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 afx_msg LPARAM CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnDriverStatusChanged( WPARAM aIndex, LPARAM )
00212 {
00213     if( aIndex == mIndex )
00214     {
00215         //This displays the driver status, but does
00216         //not request it.
00217         //When the dialog is initialized, it requests both.
00218         //The client should send messages to mCom if they are updated.
00219         TCHAR        driverStatus[50];
00220         MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mCom.mDriverStatus[ aIndex ], -1, driverStatus, 50 );
00221         driverStatus[49] = '\0';
00222         mCurrentDriverStatus.Format( _T(" %s"), driverStatus );
00223         UpdateData( FALSE );
00224     }
00225 
00226     return 0;
00227 }    /* OnDriverStatusListChanged() */

00229 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00235 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnEnChangeEditDriverId()
00236 {
00237     UpdateData( TRUE );
00238     if( mNewDriverId != "" )
00239         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_BTN_SEND_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00240     else
00241         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_BTN_SEND_ID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00242 }    /* OnEnChangeEditDriverId() */
00243 
00244 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00250 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00251 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnLbnSelchangeStatuslist()
00252 {
00253     int selectedIndex = mDriverStatusList.GetCurSel();
00254     if( selectedIndex >= 0 && selectedIndex < mDriverStatusList.GetCount() )
00255     {
00256         uint32 driverStatusId = mCom.mDriverStatuses.getKeyAt( selectedIndex );
00257         ClientListItem& driverStatusItem = mCom.mDriverStatuses.get( driverStatusId );
00258 
00259         mNewDriverStatusId.Format( _T("%u"), driverStatusId );
00260         mNewDriverStatusText.Format( _T("%s"), driverStatusItem.getCurrentName() );
00261         UpdateData( FALSE );
00262         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_BTN_DELETE_STATUS )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00263     }
00264     else
00265     {
00266         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_BTN_DELETE_STATUS )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00267     }
00268     mDriverStatusList.SetCurSel( selectedIndex );
00269 }
00270 
00271 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00275 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnBnClickedSendDriverStatus()
00276 {
00277     UpdateData( TRUE );
00278     if( mSelectedListIndex >= 0 )
00279     {
00280         uint32 driverStatusId = mCom.mDriverStatuses.getKeyAt( mSelectedListIndex );
00281 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A607
00282         mCom.sendA607DriverStatusUpdate( driverStatusId, mIndex );
00283 #else
00284         mCom.sendDriverStatusUpdate( driverStatusId );
00285 #endif
00286     }
00287 }    /* OnBnClickedSendDriverStatus() */
00288 
00289 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00292 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00293 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnBnClickedSendDriverId()
00294 {
00295     char    driverId[50];
00296 
00297     UpdateData( TRUE );
00298     WideCharToMultiByte( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mNewDriverId, -1, driverId, 50, NULL, NULL );
00299     driverId[49] = '\0';
00300 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A607
00301     mCom.sendA607DriverIdUpdate( driverId, mIndex );
00302 #else
00303     mCom.sendDriverIdUpdate( driverId );
00304 #endif
00305 }    /* OnBnClickedSendDriverId */
00306 
00307 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00310 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00311 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnBnClickedRefreshDriverId()
00312 {
00313 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00314     if( mCom.mUseMultipleDrivers )
00315     {
00316         mCom.sendA607DriverIdRequest( mIndex );
00317     }
00318     else
00319 #endif
00320     {
00321         mCom.sendDriverIdRequest();
00322     }
00323 }    /* OnBnClickedRefreshDriverId() */
00324

00328 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00329 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnBnClickedRefreshDriverStatus()
00330 {
00331 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00332     if( mCom.mUseMultipleDrivers )
00333     {
00334         mCom.sendA607DriverStatusRequest( mIndex );
00335     }
00336     else
00337 #endif
00338     {
00339         mCom.sendDriverStatusRequest();
00340     }
00341 }    /* OnBnClickedRefreshDriverStatus() */

00343 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00349 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00350 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnEnChangeEditSet()
00351 {
00352     BOOL fieldsValid = TRUE;
00353 #if !SKIP_VALIDATION
00354     char idBuffer[11];
00355     UpdateData( TRUE );
00356 
00357     memset( idBuffer, 0, sizeof( idBuffer ) );
00358     if( 0 == WideCharToMultiByte
00359                 (
00360                 CP_ACP,
00361                 0,
00362                 mNewDriverStatusId.GetBuffer(),
00363                 mNewDriverStatusId.GetLength(),
00364                 idBuffer,
00365                 sizeof( idBuffer ),
00366                 NULL, NULL
00367                 ) )
00368     {
00369         fieldsValid = FALSE;
00370     }
00371     else if( !UTIL_data_is_uint32( idBuffer ) )
00372     {
00373         fieldsValid = FALSE;
00374     }
00375 
00376     if( mNewDriverStatusText.GetLength() == 0 ||
00377         mNewDriverStatusText.GetLength() >= 50   )
00378     {
00379         fieldsValid = FALSE;
00380     }
00381 #endif
00382     GetDlgItem( IDC_DRVRINFO_BTN_ADD_STATUS )->EnableWindow( fieldsValid );
00383 } /* OnEnChangeEditSet() */
00384 
00385 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00389 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00390 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnBnClickedDelete()
00391 {
00392     UpdateData( TRUE );
00393     if( mSelectedListIndex >= 0 && mSelectedListIndex < mCom.mDriverStatuses.validCount() )
00394     {
00395         uint32 driverStatusId = mCom.mDriverStatuses.getKeyAt( mSelectedListIndex );
00396         mCom.sendDeleteDriverStatusListItem( driverStatusId );
00397     }
00398 } /* OnBnClickedDelete() */
00399 
00400 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00405 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00406 void CDriverIdAndStatusDlg::OnBnClickedSendDriverStatusItem()
00407 {
00408     UpdateData( TRUE );
00409     uint32 id = _tstoi( mNewDriverStatusId.GetBuffer() );
00410 
00411     mCom.sendDriverStatusListItem( id, mNewDriverStatusText );
00412 } /* OnBnClickedSendDriverStatusItem() */
